original_text: Some people wanted to take hold of him. But nobody could put their hands on him to take him away.
korean_text: 그 중에는 그를 잡고자 하는 자들도 있으나 손을 대는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Some people wanted to take hold of him.
But nobody could put their hands on him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아무도 그에게 손을 댈 수 없었습니다.
